file_content.text: Ugh. Ow.
You... still took all four of us apart.
That's because you're a bunch of lightweights.
You're all inferior.
It was easy.
Don't be too hard on yourselves. I've had a lot of training.
Keep practicing.
Man, I'm not sure there's enough time in the whole galaxy for us to get that good.
This changes everything. From what I hear, Vemrin's every bit your physical equal. If we can't even hold up sparring against you, we'll never be able to kill him.
I agree, you should steer clear of Vemrin.
Yes. Give it up.
Well, this has been quite the sobering experience. Thanks for setting us straight.
Nonsense, I think you're up to the task.
Go ahead. Try killing him.
You really think so?
You got it all wrong. Vemrin is just a lot of big talk and reputation.
Vemrin's nothing.
Really? You mean he gets by on the illusion of strength.
Everyone says he's a savage killer. Even though you practically slaughtered us with your eyes closed, do you really think we could take him?
Trust me--Vemrin pales compared to me.
Of course.
I trust your judgment. If you think we stand a fighting chance, I mean to prove you right.
Now that I think of it, he would tear you limb from limb.
Maybe not.
Well, I'm glad your conscience got the better of you then. Consider us humbled. Come along, Teeno.
I don't get it. Are we--are we gonna kill somebody or not?
No, Teeno. And I think we ought to rethink this whole Sith training thing.
Just ambush him. Catch him when he isn't expecting it.
If you're smart.
Ah, true. We would have that to our advantage. He would not have the benefit of foreknowledge. Very good then.
There, Teeno, I believe that's the one.
Really. All right. Hey, you!
Careful, Teeno.
Come on, I'm antsy for some action. You there! Are you the big shot they're all talking about? The one who's been personally summoned by Darth Baras himself?
News sure does travel fast.
That's me.
What do you want?
Back off.
Please pardon my overeager friend. It's just that we've heard so much about you.
And we want to get in good with you.
Teeno! What my blunt partner here means is that if you need anything or anyone, say, dealt with, we'd like you to consider us.
Why would I need help from the likes of you?
For what, exactly?
Say what you mean.
Peddle your amateur wares someplace else.
Consider yourselves rejected.
Well, I understand we're new here, but working together, we're lethal. And I happen to know you are competing with a certain blowhard.
She's talking about Vemrin. We'll kill him for you.
Sorry, I should have had Teeno muzzled. So, what do you say? We know Vemrin tried to have you killed. Would you like him eliminated?
I will not stoop to Vemrin's level.
I'm not as crude as him.
No, no, of course not, you're too smart.
Something like this would have to be handled delicately.
That would be tricky.
Of course, we completely understand.
I'm preserving the pleasure for myself.
Yes--by my own hand.
Far be it for us to rob you of such an experience. But consider this:
There are rules. Acolytes are not to openly kill one another. Everyone knows of your rivalry. If you kill him, the lords will presume your guilt.
But if Vemrin croaks while you got an alibi, people might be suspicious, but they won't be able to pin it on you. See?
I wouldn't be upset if Vemrin turns up dead.
Consider me nodding.
Say no more. Go about your business. We'll handle this with utter discretion.
What does this mean, Phyne?
It means Vemrin is a dead man, and we're going to have the most potent of allies.
This isn't how I'll handle it.
I don't know. How can I be sure you can pull it off?
Are you capable?
Let us prove ourselves to you. Spar with us, then decide if we have the skills to benefit you in this endeavor.
All right, let's see what you got.
Good idea.
At your best, boys. It's time to audition for the big show.
I don't have time for children's games.
What a waste of effort.
Oh, it won't take long. A few passes and it'll be obvious how impressive we are.
You should be warned. I will not hold back. There will be injuries.
You risk being mauled.
Well, that's the chance we're willing to take.
Come on, boys, time to show our stuff!
I'm a little preoccupied here. Sorry.
